project_name.justification: The authoritative project name is Kaycee, and the text confirms this: 'Nuclear Fuels Announces Kaycee Uranium Project Expanded to 42+ Square Miles'.

company_name.justification: The buyer is identified in the text: 'Nuclear Fuels Inc. (CSE:NF) (“Nuclear Fuels” or the “Company”) announced today that Nuclear Fuels has expanded its Kaycee Uranium Project...'

ceo_buyer.justification: The CEO of the buyer, Nuclear Fuels Inc., is named in the text: 'Michael Collins, our Chief Executive Officer, and I are excited at the opportunity presented with drilling at the Kaycee Project this Fall...'

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The article announces an expansion of land holdings, not the acquisition of a percentage interest from another company. It mentions a past deal where 'Nuclear Fuels acquired the Kaycee Project from enCore Energy Corp.', but does not specify the percentage. It only mentions enCore's future back-in right.

primary_commodity.justification: The text repeatedly refers to the project as a uranium project, for example: 'Nuclear Fuels Announces Kaycee Uranium Project Expanded to 42+ Square Miles'.

verified_article_link.justification: No verifiable article URL was provided in the source text.

currency.justification: The detailed quote section lists the company's exchange as the Canadian Securities Exchange ('Exchange: CSE'), which uses Canadian Dollars (CAD).

cash_payments_raw.justification: The announcement is about a project expansion and drilling program, not an M&A transaction involving cash payments.

share_payments_raw.justification: The announcement is about a project expansion and drilling program, not an M&A transaction involving share payments.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The announcement is about a project expansion and drilling program, not an M&A transaction involving a combined cash and share payment.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The announcement does not mention any issuance of shares as part of a transaction.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No share warrants are mentioned in the text.

option_payments_raw.justification: No options are mentioned in the text.

issued_share_price.justification: The announcement does not mention any issuance of shares, so there is no associated price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The text mentions a '200 hole rotary drill program' but does not specify a total meterage commitment.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The text mentions a 'fully-funded 200 hole rotary drill program' but does not provide a specific monetary value for the commitment.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The text does not mention any Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) or other royalty as part of the project details or any transaction.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The text states the total area of the project: 'The Kaycee Project, in Wyoming’s prolific Powder River Basin (“PRB”) now extends more than 33-miles along trend with over 110 miles of identified roll fronts and consists of more than 42 square miles of mineral rights.'

coverage_area_unit.justification: The unit for the coverage area is explicitly mentioned: '...consists of more than 42 square miles of mineral rights.'

resource_size.justification: The text indicates that a resource has not yet been established and that this is a future goal: '...upon Nuclear Fuels establishing a minimum 15 million pound U3O8 43-101 compliant resource.' and '...statements relating to planned exploration programs and the results of additional exploration work in seeking to establish mineral resources as defined in NI43-101 on any of our properties.'

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The company's ticker and exchange are provided in the first paragraph: 'Nuclear Fuels Inc. (CSE:NF) (“Nuclear Fuels” or the “Company”)...'
